colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYU MTSAN 'GA' ZHIG SA BRTEN NAS, RANG NYID KYI MO PA'I 'TSAMS SBYAR TE, RJE BTZUN GYI DNGOS SLOB DPON RDZOGS STON PA BHO DHI R'A DZA DANG, ZHVA DMAR BA DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I GSOL KHA DANG, RJE BTZUN KUN DGA' SNYING POS GRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DU GSUNG BA'I CHOG BSGRIGS RNAMS GZHIR BZHAG PA LA MA TSANG BA KHA BSKANGS, ,GO RIM KHRIGS SU SDEBS, ,TSIG SBYOR 'GA' ZHIG GSAR DU BGYIS TE CHA TSANG LA 'KHYER BDE BAR, ,BTZUN GZUGS ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GZHIS KA AO RGYAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
